card.text: He is a student from time to time.

card.chinese: 照片要三天才能洗出来。
card.text: It takes three days for the photos to be developed.

card.chinese: 各位乘客，飞机马上就要起飞了。
card.text: Everyone, the plane will take off soon.
There is a grain of rice beside my sister's mouth.
Smoking is prohibited in public places.

card.chinese: 这种植物我们都没见过。
card.text: We have never seen this kind of plant.
